description: Frontend UI messages and error messages for English Learning Chatbot.

speech_recognition.not_supported: Speech recognition not supported in this browser. Please use Chrome, Edge, Safari, or Firefox with HTTPS.
speech_recognition.https_required: Speech recognition requires HTTPS or localhost. Current protocol: {protocol}
speech_recognition.error_no_speech: No speech was detected. Please try speaking again.
speech_recognition.error_audio_capture: Audio capture failed. Please check your microphone.
speech_recognition.error_not_allowed: Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone access and try again.
speech_recognition.error_network: Network error occurred. Please check your connection.
speech_recognition.error_generic: An error occurred with speech recognition.

errors.network_error: Connection error. Please check your internet and try again.
errors.server_error: Server error. Please try again in a moment.
errors.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page.
